data.comment: The match is underway in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kobe's Ryuho Kikuchi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 4, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
Goal kick for Kobe at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki have been given a penalty at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium...
In the minute 7, Hirofumi Watanabe (Kobe) gets a yellow card.
Yu Kobayashi nets and Kawasaki now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Akihiro Ienaga. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 13, Kawasaki push upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 16, Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
Ryota Ohshima (Kawasaki) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 18, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kobe throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Free kick Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Ryota Ohshima is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! Kobe go level at 1-1 through Kyogo Furuhashi in Kawasaki.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 27, Dankler (Kobe) has received a yellow card from Hiroyuki Kimura.
Throw-in for Kobe at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Manabu Saito (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Yu Kobayashi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 45, Kobe to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 47, Hidemasa Morita of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Akihiro Ienaga for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Kobe at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 54, Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Kaoru Mitoma is replacing Reo Hatate for the home team.
In Kawasaki Kobe attack through Noriaki Fujimoto. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 58, Kawasaki are pushing forward but Ryota Ohshima's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Noriaki Fujimoto is on target to give Kobe a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 59, Great play from Hotaru Yamaguchi to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 63, Kobe have a goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kobe a goal kick.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a fourth substitution, with Taisei Miyashiro replacing Manabu Saito.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Akihiro Ienaga with Yasuto Wakizaka. This is the second substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kawasaki.
Shintaro Kurumaya is on a sub for Kyohei Noborizato for Kawasaki.
In the minute 68, Kobe make their first substitution with Keijiro Ogawa replacing Takuya Yasui.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 74, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Yu Kobayashi with Leandro Damiao.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kobe are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 78, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Kobe's area.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thorsten Fink is making the team's second substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Yutaro Oda replacing Noriaki Fujimoto.
In the minute 80, Free kick Kobe.
Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
An attacking Kawasaki player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 82, Ryuho Kikuchi is booked for the away team.
Leandro Damiao scores from the spot and Kawasaki draw level at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 85, Goal! Taisei Miyashiro gives Kawasaki a 3-2 lead in Kawasaki.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kobe.
In the minute 88, Sergi Samper for Kobe drives towards goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Kobe's area.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Kawasaki.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kawasaki.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Kawasaki. The final score is 3-2.
